name: Mega Desktop
body:
### Mega Desktop

### Hi there!
This is an app to upload and download files from Mega.co.nz

### Features
- Large file support
- Music/Movie streaming (Coming soon!)
- [.NET API](https://github.com/sybil-sink/mega-sdk)

### Download
```
Coming soon. We're waiting for a code review results
from the official MEGA team before releasing.
The SDK is already up, though.
```

### Contact
[UserVoice](http://megadesktop.uservoice.com/forums/191321-general) | team@megadesktop.com | [@Mega_Desktop](https://twitter.com/Mega_Desktop)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
